title: Lease Up? This Brand-New 3-Bedroom has the SPACE you need!
posting_body: This Brand-New 3-Bedroom has the SPACE you need!
It's time to make some changes, stop paying too much for your old, cramped apartment!
This Brand NEW home is full of upgrades you'll love at a price you can afford so why rent when you can own?
You can own this spacious home for less than you pay in rent!
Call us today to find out how.
If responding by email, please provide your contact information.
P & I. Price $369,900, 5.50% Fixed / 6.18% APR, 20% Down, CONV 30 Year OAC from third party lender.
Other fees such as taxes, insurance and HOA are not included in the sample monthly payment amount.
Prices and rates are subject to change without notice.
